description:
The North Loop Sweater for men comes with a disclaimer: you may end up wearing it every day. That's because this organic cotton sweater always fits the mood "just right." Just the right amount of warmth (without bulk), and just the right amount of style (while still basic).

Soft-to-the-touch and with a slim fit for a more modern silhouette, they think this sweater will earn its keep in your closet in no time at all.
name: Prana North Loop Sweater - Slim - Mens
